Description: Suggest remedies for severe cough due to pneumonia
DialogueText:
Patient:
Hi .. I have been diagnosed with Pnemonia and have not slept in 4 days because of the coughing .. i'm hurting everywhere, going sligtly insane and cannot get to sleep no matter how much i try .. as soon as i breath in, it hurts and a cough .. any suggestions ?
Doctor:
HiAfter spme days of the proper treatment you will feel better again. Don't worry it takes ssometime to recover. Dr.Jolanda
